Title: Requires certain civil court documents to be provided to parties in their native language
Summary: Relates to requiring certain civil court documents to be provided to parties in their native language and requiring parties to demonstrate their understanding of the nature and effect of such documents.
LawSection: New York City Civil Court Act
LawCode: Add ยง2105, NYC Civ Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the New York city civil court act, in relation to requiring certain civil court documents to be provided to parties in their native language
